quote: You should visit the Palatine. It's at the top of that hill . . .""""I know where the Palatine is, Dexter, I was visiting Rome before you were born.""""Yes, who was emperor back then?
quote_letters: YOU SHOULD VISIT THE PALATINE ITS AT THE TOP OF THAT HILL I KNOW WHERE THE PALATINE IS DEXTER I WAS VISITING ROME BEFORE YOU WERE BORNYES WHO WAS EMPEROR BACK THEN
